data.eml:eml: The genus Ademon Haliday (Hymenoptera: Braconidae: Opiinae) from China, with descriptions of two new species

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Wu, Qiong, He, Jun-Hua, Chen, Xue-Xin (2014): The genus Ademon Haliday (Hymenoptera: Braconidae: Opiinae) from China, with descriptions of two new species. Zootaxa 3794 (2): 294-298, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.3794.2.8
